title: Im new , But this MOBA has a poor design for newcomers.
body:
Im only lvl 5 yet , im a Veteran smite player Diamond 5 in S3 atm , i quit because i had no fun there anymore and the ranked system there is beyond Broken , ELO Ratings there also dont match up , So i left and im trying this Most popular MOBA out i have some things to say , that could have been done 10x better

-The Bots Beginner is to Easy for a MOBA veteran
-Intermidiate Steps up way to high
Bots matches for us newcomers are Frustrating 2 in top and bottom lanes and 1 in mid , And i know this is not the way to go so when you go solo , You cant farm , if you can Write a code for bots Being actually really intelligent in teamfight you can code to make them go jungle like it does not make sense do i need to play vs smurfs all day to have a slight knowledge for how the jungle works?

Also the Bots have skins making it hard for me to reconize a Champion so early like there are tons of them , and if you go in Bots and Evry fucking time they have a different skin i can't seem to keep them out of each other i sometimes think one or another they are the same or it's just a fuck up remove the skins from bot games for us new players we can't even learn who is who keep them Default 

the scoreboard and the poorly designed Info when your in game , Idk who's magical or physical or who's a support or tank? 

In smite you can hoover over the names and get all the info on the scoreboard from tank to mage to what they are capeable off , so does the Base stats , Just to give us a idea how to build and what we are facing?

The Active's yes the actives , you need to unlock them on the way to level 30? All bots have all kinds of Actives but you no your stuck with the One's given to you , Like why can't you just unlock them all and let us choose what to use we can read right? like why keep it locked behind a level cap 

I can't stretch the gui on my desktop it's so small i had to reduce my resolution to make it fit the screen

Just Overall , Most new players will just Leave , not because of the smurfs or something else but the Lack Of Info about this game the champions the actives , 

Could you not just give them a easy way to go like the videos on the frontpage Highlight them out they are so small , or you can just make them play before they start going into the Conquest mode , to give them a slight idea of what to do , like give a in game handbook instead of those Tips , Im actually Have a clue what A MOBA is and i am even stuck  

Im not a Smite fanboy , it's just they seem to do alot better for newcomers? Like Me!

If anyone would like to help me out a bit i would appreciate it , thanks add me scepticjack

replies.body: i read like 70% of this and got tired, dude grow up, stop crying and pass trough that. we all started from 0, all what u experienced is normal. go see videos in youtube, play diferent champions, play aram and you will learn.

I encourage you to leave this feedback on the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), where feedback like this is intended to go. As for your GUI issue, are you playing at 4K or any resolution above 1920x1200? If so, this is a common issue, as League doesn't fully support higher resolutions over 1080p just yet.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I play on 2K Resolution , And Alright will do :) i had no clue where to post it.

I am so Sorry for the Late Reply, But i would like to move it to Misc Board but , it says im not level 7 when im level 8 in game.

But Yea this Moba out of all is easy to understand , but all the info you need to get a tier Up is poorly written or placed Well now im on day 3 It's actually pretty easy to understand , Since i know what to look for , Im getting a oversight about the champions but some skins still have me wondering , They are far from the original?

But whatever :D

About bots i guess they are fine as they are - they can never step up enough and having them use skins allows the player to be more used to the landscape that awaits after the bots.

Regarding champion unlock i agree it is a bit of a pain and i hope they will fix that soon because at least at the beginning is a bit hard ti decide and get things going on. I suggest you to get with IP the 450 champions, they are as good as 6300 ones and many of them got updated with modern skillsets and models. Just don't mind Nunu, he's a thing in its own.
Also remember that LoL is centered less about counterpicks and more about personal use, so once you like a character you can stick to it for a long time :)

About client pre-game issues they are about to release a new one, i am in open (restricted ) alpha and let me tell ya it is shaping very very good :)

You can expect a major update around half of november since it is the end of the season, more or less. This probably will include the client and other system changes.

Honestly League has never been all that beginner friendly in terms of tutorials or assistance for newer players...
It's tutorial and leveling experience sucks (is there even a need for levels to begin with?)

Though it is a simpler and easier game then say DotA (though DotA seem to have a better tutorial and such but I guess they kind of need that?)

And Heroes of the Storm is even simpler and easier than league not having to deal with items.... and items are a big deal since if you buy the wrong ones you can quickly become very weak (though I don't actually know Heroes of the Storm all that well)
Yeah, please post this where it should go. I completely agree with everything you mentioned.
